tours.title: Discover interesting things in the romantic coastal city of Vungtau

overview.title: Set sail for the idyllic Italian island of Capri on this full-day tour, including round-trip jetfoil transfers from Naples or Sorrento. Stop to browse the handicraft stores of Anacapri and soak up the atmosphere in buzzing La Piazzetta. Top it off with a visit to the Blue Grotto and a funicular ride to Marina Grande.
list: Full-day tour of Capri island from Naples or Sorrento Admire views along the coast as you cruise to the island by jetfoil
Visit the lively island towns of Anacapri and Capri Ride
The funicular from La Piazzetta to Marina Grande Marvel at natural wonders like the Blue Grotto Small-group tour ensures a personalized experience

What's Included: Shared boat ride tour around the island ( if Blue grotto is closed)

Departure Point: Molo Beverello, 80133 Napoli NA, Italy
Hotel Il Faro, Via Marina Piccola, 5, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

locations.name: Molo Beverello
locations.des: We start our trip from the famouse place Jemaa Lefna in center of Marrakech, Crossed the highest Atlas Through pass (Tizi N Tichka)

locations.name: Marina Piccola
locations.des: so we will visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site Ait Benhaddou / Official name Ksar of Ait-Ben-Haddou is located in south of Morocco, It is an ighrem (fortified village in English) (ksar in Arabic), along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech in present-day Morocco. Most citizens attracted by the tourist trade live in more modern dwellings in a village on the other side of the river, although there are four families still living in the ancient village. Inside the walls of the ksar are half a dozen (Kasbahs) or merchants houses and other individual dwellings,

locations.name: Blue Grotto
locations.des: Pass trough the Ait Saouen Col in anti atlas

locations.name: Villa San Michele
locations.des: Crossed by the Draa valley, where there is more than 2 million palms along the draa river which stretches for a length to Senegal to the south.

tours.title: Discover interesting things in the romantic coastal city of Vungtau

overview.title: Set sail for the idyllic Italian island of Capri on this full-day tour, including round-trip jetfoil transfers from Naples or Sorrento. Stop to browse the handicraft stores of Anacapri and soak up the atmosphere in buzzing La Piazzetta. Top it off with a visit to the Blue Grotto and a funicular ride to Marina Grande.
list: Full-day tour of Capri island from Naples or Sorrento Admire views along the coast as you cruise to the island by jetfoil
Visit the lively island towns of Anacapri and Capri Ride
The funicular from La Piazzetta to Marina Grande Marvel at natural wonders like the Blue Grotto Small-group tour ensures a personalized experience

What's Included: Shared boat ride tour around the island ( if Blue grotto is closed)

Departure Point: Molo Beverello, 80133 Napoli NA, Italy
Hotel Il Faro, Via Marina Piccola, 5, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy
